Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Southbound Reroute near 131st Langley
ShortDescription: Southbound 34 South Michigan buses are temp rrtd via 133rd Place, 134th Street and Indiana, then resume normal route, due to street blockage near 131st Langley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 133rd Place, 134th Street and Indiana, then resume normal route, due to street blockage near 131st Langley.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #20 Madison and #52 Kedzie/California Temporary Reroute near Madison/Kedzie
ShortDescription: 20 Madison and 52 Kedzie/California buses temporarily rerouted in both directions near Madison/Kedzie due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#20 Madison and #52 Kedzie/California buses temporarily rerouted in both directions near Madison/Kedzie due to police activity.

Eastbound #20 Madison buses will operate via Madison, Homan, Warren, Sacramento, Madison and over regular route.

Westbound #20 Madison buses will operate via Madison, Sacramento, Washington, Homan, Madison and over regular route.

Southbound #52 Kedzie/California buses will operate via Kedzie, Warren, Sacramento, Jackson, Kedzie and over regular route.

Northbound #52 Kedzie/California buses will operate via Kedzie, Jackson, Sacramento, Washington, Kedzie and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.
